name: Dice Roll Hero
description:
Dice Roll Hero is a DnD inspired game about killing monsters and finding loot, in a world of randomness.

This was created for the GMTK Game Jam 2022 and the theme was Roll of the Dice.

Everything was made for the Jam only.

How to play:
Use your mouse to click abilities and buttons. 

We did not work on this on Saturday and therefore we didn't have much time, but we knew this going into the jam and therefore it is no excuse for our mistakes and lack of sound and animation. We still wanted to join though and do what we could in our limited time, as well as join the community

Just after submitting we found a bug, meaning that you will not be able to use the abilities that you find. This is something we will fix later, but for obvious reasons cannot do now. We hope that you still get the idea though.

Thanks for playing!

Nikkilite - Developer
Froggystyle - Developer & Artist
